snippet: Edward J. Snowden and the journalist Laura Poitras, who helped him disclose the documents on government surveillance, will receive a Ridenhour prize.
abstract: Ridenhour prize for truth-telling will be given to former National Security Agency contractor Edward J Snowden and Laura Poitras, filmmaker and journalist who helped Snowden disclose his trove of documents on government surveillance.
lead_paragraph: Edward J. Snowden and the journalist Laura Poitras, who helped him disclose the documents on government surveillance, will receive a Ridenhour prize.
